dialog.body: Hi, I'm interested in piano lessons. Could you tell me more about your pricing?
Hello! This is Scott Young from Noteworthy. I'd be happy to help you with that. May I know which level of piano lessons you are interested in?
I'm looking for beginner lessons for my 10-year-old daughter.
Great! We offer beginner lessons at $25 per 30-minute session. How does that sound?
That sounds reasonable. Do you offer any discounts for multiple sessions or siblings?
Yes, we do! We offer a 10% discount for siblings and a package discount if you book 10 sessions in advance. Would you like more information on these packages?
Yes, please. The package discount sounds interesting.
Sure, if you book 10 sessions, the price drops to $22.50 per session. Can I help you with anything else?
No, that's all. Thank you, Scott!
You're welcome, Kathleen! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
